short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to assist with reviewing GitHub pull request

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PR review simplified! Cut down PR review time by more than 50% using our AI assistant. Using our tool, you can navigate a PR faster, understand what the change is, why its made and how it affects the rest of the code. Stay tuned for more features to make your PR review process easier.
